MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 03-DEC-2020 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the PR8 postcode area of Southport, affecting properties in Shaftesbury Road and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power and loss of supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.55PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6.12PM on 3rd December 2020
